widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: 50-State Surveys. We worked on surveys on compulsory education laws for the Education Law Center and the emancipation of minors for the Family Law Center, among other surveys.
Justia Legal Dictionary. We completed this project, producing a resource with thousands of legal and business definitions compiled with AI assistance from multiple sources.
Case Summaries. We committed plenty of time and effort to testing a new tool that will allow us to use AI to summarize cases more efficiently.
